title: Client is laggy
body:
So I opened up my client today and it was lagging. When I tried to login, it was stuck in loading for 5 minutes before it finally logged in. My client was working just fine yesterday, and I haven't done anything to my computer. I have low spec mode enabled.

EDIT: When I tried to load into a custom game, it took 10 minutes. When I finally loaded in, I had 15 frames instead of my usual 60.

replies.body: It's starting to look like some players are getting a lot of packet loss all of the sudden, so I'd like to start looking into that. Hit up this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) and use the game logs that took forever to load and had the low fps. Take a screenshot and post it here for me that way I can go over it with you!

Is that your latest log? It seems odd.. some people are getting drops in packet and higher ping, yet something unknown is causing it. I've already tested another region and there are no issues yet NA reports are coming in over and over on this matter. I've spoken with another Riot member, he/she stated it was my ISP yet, if that was the case my issue on NA would link over to another region also because it'd be an ISP problem. Plus someone else on NA lives only about an hour away country wise and has the same issue with the same ping error connecting to the NA game server, so it seems to be spreading out. Whatever the issue is I think the fact that so many people are having the issue linking to this, it's not anything to do with the people, but the server itself, and sufficient enough reports and proof is throughout the board to prove such theory. I do hope this gets noticed and brought up and also fixed soon because I do like playing and I do love the work you guys put in for all this.

Edit: This is to help with more of an understanding of where the issue lies mainly. Since I am sure many think it's an ISP issue
Yeah it's my latest log. My ping stays at a constant 19, but my frames have dropped. I'm sure it's not my hardware because I played a game a couple hours earlier.
I see, yeah it's odd. and it's happening to people in US and any other part of the world playing. Something is going on, just wanted to crosscheck the log just incase
Uhh... I unplugged my laptop, moved to the living room, and opened League to test it again. It stopped lagging.

Hmmmmm yea doesn't look like packet loss is the issue here. This might be a little redundant, but go ahead and try updating some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well. Let me know if you notice any difference and if not we can troubleshoot a little more.
Nope, client is still lagging. And my frames are still dropping.
